tutorialModule.title: Module 1: Planning the meal
tutorialModule.abstract: In this module you will plan your PB&J meal. The lessons in this module teach you how to plan your menu and gather the appropriate supplies and ingredients.

tutorialModuleBody.learningObjectives:
Learning objectivesAfter completing the lessons in this module you will understand the concepts and know how to do the following:
Put together a menu for a PB&J meal
Gather the necessary supplies and ingredients for a PB&J meal
tutorialModuleBody.timeRequired: Time requiredThis module should take approximately 5 minutes to complete.
